Orb of Transmutation.effect: Upgrades a normal item to a magic item

Orb of Augmentation.effect: Adds a new modifier to a magic item

Orb of Alchemy.effect: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item

Orb of Chance.effect: Upgrades a normal item to a random rarity

Exalted Orb.effect: Adds a new modifier to a rare item

Chaos Orb.effect: Rerolls all modifiers on a rare item

Divine Orb.effect: Rerolls the numeric values of all modifiers on an item

Regal Orb.effect: Upgrades a magic item to a rare item

Orb of Annulment.effect: Removes a random modifier from an item
